pr_title: [Fix]SlotRef.tosql() is the same as the SQL returned by different sql

timeline.message: fixed bug:SlotRef.tosql() is the same as the SQL returned by different SQL

timeline.bodyText:
How about return both slot id and expr. I'm afraid that slot id may be used for some tracing debug.
And please fix all related unit tests after you change here.
timeline.author: morningman

replies.bodyText: How about slot ID and expr? I need MD5 of SQL as the key of cache instead of slot ID. I'm trying to fix the other unit tests
replies.author: marising

timeline.message: Tosql method returns slot index and column name
